keywords.DESCRIPTION: A card of Monkey Pugilism series.
Consume Banana Essence to do extra actions.
Consume Banana Essence to do actions.
The essence extracted from bananas, can excite the potential of monkeys.
Gain Block whenever you consume Banana Essence.
Deal damage to a random enemy whenever you gain Banana Essence.
Can not gain Banana Essence in a given period of time.
